name: Tamagowari
description:
made for Godot Community Game Jam - Dec 2016/Jan 2017.

This is A game that breaks as many tamagos as possible in time.

You may try how break tamago before you start game.

Controls

[Red button] = Knock

[Blue button] = Hold

windows:

[Right arrow keys] = Blue button

[Left arrow keys] = Red button

Source Code:Github

created by D & D

Game Development: D

Game Design & Art: Dami

BGM:フリー音楽素材/魔王魂

SE:On-Jin ～音人～, Music is VFR

Hud textures of Result Screen:Kenney

Fonts:Action-Man
